segments.en: “Mendicants, I will teach you an exposition of the teaching, an explanation of one who has reached sanctuary.
And what is an exposition of the teaching, an explanation of one who has reached sanctuary?

segments.pli: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
segments.en: There are sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.

segments.pli: Te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
segments.en: The Realized One has given these up, cut them off at the root, made them like a palm stump, and obliterated them, so they are unable to arise in the future.

segments.pli: Tesañca pahānāya akkhāsi yogaṃ, tasmā tathāgato ‘yogakkhemī’ti vuccati … pe …
segments.en: He teaches meditation for giving them up. That’s why the Realized One is called one who has reached sanctuary. …

segments.pli: santi, bhikkhave, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
segments.en: There are thoughts known by the mind that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.

segments.pli: Te tathāgatassa pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
segments.en: The Realized One has given these up, cut them off at the root, made them like a palm stump, and obliterated them, so they are unable to arise in the future.

segments.pli: Tesañca pahānāya akkhāsi yogaṃ, tasmā tathāgato ‘yogakkhemī’ti vuccati.
segments.en: He teaches meditation for giving them up. That’s why the Realized One is called one who has reached sanctuary.
This is an exposition of the teaching, an explanation of one who has reached sanctuary.”

suttaplex.blurb: Someone who has given up attraction to the senses has arrived at the sanctuary.
